entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
